name: Flip (itch) (xzippyzachx)
description:
What The Flip?

Flip your way through the levels as fast as you can.  Master the unexpected flipping mechanic to set the best run time. 

This is a level based speed runner game. Post your best run time for each level in the comments!

This game was made in 48 hrs for a game Jam.

Theme: The Unexpected

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Sprint - Left Shift
  • Restart Level - R
  • Next Level - L

Check out my Youtube
